channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Cette mini borne d’arcade avec 45 jeux perd plus de 40 % de son prix chez Amazon pour les soldes d’hiver
item.description: Entre un design qui tient dans la main et 45 jeux disponibles, cette mini borne d'arcade de la marque Unico pourra vous assurer de longues heures de jeu. Amazon profite des soldes d'hiver pour retirer 41 % de son prix et la faire passer à 59,49 euros.

item.title: Best Deals for New Year’s Resolutions: Sleep, Fitness, and More (2026)
item.description: Whether you’re hitting the gym or tracking your schedule, these discounts on WIRED-approved gear can help.

item.title: I tested the Dezctop Revon Elite - a quality standing desk with modular organization and accessories like I haven’t seen before
item.description: The Dezctop Revon Elite has a simple standing desk design plus a useful magnetic accessory system that allows for organization and tools like no other desk I’ve used offering a whole new layer of features.

item.title: Roborock’s Iconic Wet and Dry Vacuums at Nearly 40% Off to Start Year Right
item.description: The flagship F25 Ultra Wet and Dry Vacuum and the powerful F25 GT are both marked down in a big way, but for a limited time only.

item.title: Fujifilm X-E5 Mirrorless Camera Review: Compact Color Science in a Retro Package
item.description: Did you want the TikTok-popular X100VI, but with an interchangeable lens? The Fujifilm X-E5 has you covered.

item.title: The 50 Best Movies on Netflix, WIRED’s Picks (January 2026)
item.description: Good Night, and Good Luck: Live From Broadway, Frankenstein, and Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery are just a few of the movies you should watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: The 50 Best Shows on Netflix, WIRED's Picks (January 2026)
item.description: Stranger Things, Run Away, and His & Hers are just a few of the shows you need to watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: 5 best phone accessories of CES 2026 — from the practical to the weird
item.description: Loads of exciting smartphone accessories were announced at CES 2026, and these are the very best of them.

item.title: Why Elon Musk is laughing off Grok’s flood of deepfake AI porn
item.description: When you own the regulators, creating sexualized images of women and children isn’t a bug—it’s a business model. From the moment Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence company, xAI, began rolling out its Grok chatbot to paid X subscribers in 2023, it pitched the tool as the bad boy of large language models. Grok would supposedly be authorized to say and do things that its politically correct competitors—primarily ChatGPT, produced by Musk’s old nemeses at OpenAI—would not. ...

item.title: Shokz OpenFit Pro Review: ANC on Open Earbuds?
item.description: True ANC on a set of open-ear earbuds would be a game changer. Shokz's OpenFit Pro give us a taste of what that might be like.

item.title: ICE Can Now Spy on Every Phone in Your Neighborhood
item.description: Plus: Iran shuts down its internet amid sweeping protests, an alleged scam boss gets extradited to China, and more.

item.title: These key upgrades are rumored to be on the way for the iPhone Air 2 model
item.description: A fresh report suggests we'll get improvements in cameras, battery life, and screen brightness on the next model.

item.title: Lutte contre l’IPTV illégale : Cloudflare accuse un « cercle opaque d’élites médiatiques européennes » de censurer internet
item.description: Le ton monte d'un cran en Italie, entre Cloudflare et le régulateur des communications du pays. À tel point que le géant mondial des infrastructures internet menace de débrancher les serveurs installés en Italie.

item.title: 12 Best Coffee Subscriptions (2026), Tested by Caffeine Hounds
item.description: These services deliver freshly roasted, delicious coffee picks right to your door—each with its own twist.

item.title: Montres connectées : ces 4 avancées majeures vont changer votre quotidien en 2026
item.description: Après une année 2025 déjà particulièrement intéressante dans le domaine des wearables, cette nouvelle année 2026 s'annonce particulièrement enthousiasmante avec des nouveautés aussi bien sur les mesures que les fonctionnalités.

item.title: Goldring's G3 turntable is all about style and convenience, but there's one aspect I wish I could switch off...
item.description: The Goldring GR3 turntable offers plug-and-play convenience, great value and excellent sound but there's one areas you'll want to turn off

item.title: New Year, new (cheap) phone plan - this Mint Mobile deal gets you a full year of unlimited data for just $15/mo
item.description: Mint Mobile's still offering a full year of unlimited data for just $15/mo - don't miss this incredible deal before it vanishes for good.

item.title: 5 things I like about the Hydrow Wave smart rowing machine — and 2 I don't
item.description: A fantastic smart rowing machine that'll work for just about anyone, providing they can pay the premium.

item.title: Digital ticketing was supposed to stop fraud, but ticket scams have gotten worse—just ask Taylor Swift
item.description: Brokers, leagues, and venues are finding ways to combat the growing ticket scam problem. Here’s how you can protect yourself. Detective Mike McCaffrey laughs when I ask if they busted the door down. Maybe I’ve seen too many movies. Normally, he says, they would. But in this instance, it’s not the ticket scam perpetrator’s residence. It’s his mother’s. So, in this high-rise apartment building on 96th Street in Manhattan, he simply knocks. The mother answers, kindly, oblivious to why the NYPD is at her door on this Tuesday morning....

item.title: Xiaomi prépare un smartphone avec ventilateur interne : la fin définitive de la surchauffe ?
item.description: Xiaomi travaillerait sur un smartphone totalement étanche et équipé d'un ventilateur physique interne.
